Modify a GradeReportTemplate

Source: R/Grading.R
modifyGradeReportTemplate.Rd

This function modifies a GradeReportTemplate

modifyGradeReportTemplate(
  GradeReportTemplateID,
  ConfigEntityYearID = NULL,
  GradeReportColumnGroupIDSecondary = NULL,
  ReportRunInfoID = NULL,
  MediaIDLogo = NULL,
  Description = NULL,
  TemplateType = NULL,
  UseFreeFormGradingLegend = NULL,
  FreeFormGradingLegend = NULL,
  UseGradeMarkDescriptionGradingLegend = NULL,
  UseGradeMarkRangeGradingLegend = NULL,
  UseStudentSectionLinking = NULL,
  TeacherNameFormat = NULL,
  StudentNameFormat = NULL,
  AdvisorNameFormat = NULL,
  GuardianNameFormat = NULL,
  PrintGPA = NULL,
  PrintGradeScaleAtTop = NULL,
  PrintElectronicSignature = NULL,
  PrintBlankSignatureLine = NULL,
  OfficialSignatureLabel = NULL,
  BlankSignatureLabel = NULL,
  PrintAttendanceTotals = NULL,
  PrintYearToDateTotals = NULL,
  PrintIndividualAttendanceTerms = NULL,
  PrintComments = NULL,
  PrintFreeFormComments = NULL,
  CommentPrintType = NULL,
  ReceivesForms = NULL,
  NoReceivingFamily = NULL,
  GradingSort = NULL,
  CourseDescriptionFormat = NULL,
  StudentSort1 = NULL,
  StudentSort2 = NULL,
  StudentSort3 = NULL,
  StudentSort4 = NULL,
  DisplayPeriodCodeSort1 = NULL,
  DisplayPeriodCodeSort2 = NULL,
  DisplayPeriodCodeSort3 = NULL,
  DisplayPeriodCodeSort4 = NULL,
  GPAField1 = NULL,
  GPAField2 = NULL,
  GPAField3 = NULL,
  GPAField4 = NULL,
  GPAField5 = NULL,
  GPAField6 = NULL,
  GPAField7 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel1 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel2 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel3 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel4 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel5 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel6 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel7 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel8 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel9 = NULL,
  ColumnHeaderLabel10 = NULL,
  CourseFilter = NULL,
  IncludeTranscriptNotes = NULL,
  GradeReportAcademicSessionTemplateGroupID = NULL,
  AcademicSessionType = NULL,
  IncludeInProgressGrades = NULL,
  IncludeCurrentYearClasses = NULL,
  FamilyPrintType = NULL,
  IncludeTransferCourses = NULL,
  PrintAllCourseRowHeaders = NULL,
  GradeReportTemplateIDClonedFrom = NULL,
  IncludePhoneInEntityAddress = NULL,
  IncludePhoneInGuardianAddress = NULL,
  PrintEndorsements = NULL,
  PrintHighFrequencyWords = NULL,
  PrintLettersAndSounds = NULL,
  EarnedCreditsMethodIDDefaultOverride = NULL,
  PrintYearAttendanceTotals = NULL,
  PrintStudentHighlights = NULL,
  PrintVaccinations = NULL,
  PrintCTEPrograms = NULL,
  entityId = 1,
  schoolYearId = NULL,
  flatten = T,
  returnResponse = F
)

Arguments

entityId

The id of the entity (school). Run listEntities for a list of entities. Defaults to 1 (district).
schoolYearId

The id of the schoolYear. Run listSchoolYears for a list of school years. Defaults to NULL (all school years).
flatten

Whether to flatten result into a dataframe or return the json object. Default is TRUE (flatten to dataframe).
returnResponse

Whether to return the server response instead of the results. Useful for debugging. Default is FALSE.
fieldNames

The field values to give the modified GradeReportTemplate. Each defaults to NULL.

Value

The modified GradeReportTemplate Skyward's Knowledge Hub

  • Value
